bug.author: goooxu
bug.summary: Abnormal behavior if start 2 experiments at same time
bug.description:
Opened 2 terminates on a same machine and run the command nnictl create --config ~/nni/examples/trials/mnist-annotation/config.yml at same time expect one of them is succeeded, another is failed, but actually encountered 2 cases
case 1 Both of the 2 commands show
case 2 Both of the 2 commands seem started successfully, the actually no running experiment (the webui can't be opened)
